comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: nla.gov.au/nla.pic-vn6250959 another pic of the Bellatrix...looking at the state of construction of the Harbour Bridge, the date currently given for the Fairfax Collection pic is incorrect...looks more like December 1930...or possibly January 1931...here's early March 1931 - investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp...
